sn7.19:1.2: Then a brahmin who supported his mother approached the Blessed One
sn7.19:1.4: Master Gotama, I seek almsfood righteously and thereby support my mother and father.
sn7.19:1.5: In doing so, am I doing my duty?
sn7.19:1.6: For sure, brahmin, in doing so you are doing your duty.
sn7.19:1.7: One who seeks almsfood righteously and thereby supports his mother and father generates much merit.
sn7.19:2.5: praise him here in this world,
sn7.19:2.6: And after death he rejoices in heaven.
sn7.19:3.1: When this was said,the brahmin who supported his mother said to the Blessed One:
sn7.19:3.2: Magnificent, Master Gotama! Magnificent, Master Gotama!…
sn7.19:3.3: Let Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who from today has gone for refuge for life.
